body: ok i found the answers for the 2 messages. i give them in case of certain person have the same error message : to resolve `php startup: unable to load dynamic library '/usr/lib/php5/20090626/intl.so' - /usr/lib/php5/20090626/intl.so: cannot open shared object file: no such file or directory at unknown#0` you need to comment in php.ini the line extension=intl.so and restart apache2. when it's done, it give me the same error message in owncloud with fileinfo.so so i comment it too in php.ini. to resolve `session_start() [function.session-start]: ps_files_cleanup_dir: opendir(/var/lib/php5) failed: permission denied (13) at /var/www/cloud/lib/base.php#328` you need to edit php.ini and set session.gc_probability to 0 (or uncomment the line) i found the answer on [stackoverflow](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/2904862/issues-with-php-5-3-and-sessions-folder/2952173#2952173)
